preface.p: This Solutions Manual for Understanding Linear Algebra is organized by section with each exercise starting at the top of its own page. This should make it easy to extract only the solutions to certain exercises.

Please do not post this solutions manual publicly on the internet nor in any electronic form where it is available in full to students. As much as possible, we aspire to keep this solutions manual as a resource for instructors only so that students get the full benefit of activities and exercises by engaging with them without looking at solutions.

By extracting individual pages from the PDF, it is fine to share solutions to individual activities or exercises via course management system software. Please do not post these individual pages publicly on the internet.
